biotools.summary: circHiC is a Python library, built upon the widely used Matplotlib library, to display Hi-C-like data in circular strips together with the possibility to overlay genomic data (plots and heat maps). Tools are light and fast, aiming to facilitate the exploration and understanding of bacterial chromosome structuring data.
